adi-about.name: Aditya Sharma
adi-about.bio:
I am a senior at San Francisco State University pursuing a Computer Science degree.
Currently I am aiming to graduate in the Spring of 2025 and hopefully land a job as a full stack software developer in time.
I am a part of Team 04 and I am a team member able to assist in the front and back end of the project.

andre-about.name: André Shannon
andre-about.bio:
André is currently pursuing a masters in computer science at
San Francisco State University. He received a Bachelor of
Science in Mathematics and Computer Science from the University
of Richmond. His current interests are in AI and robotics, and
in particular reinforcement learning. Some hobbies include
soccer, climbing, reading fantasy and science fiction, biking,
and solving variations of the Rubik’s cube.

anh-about.name: Anh Tran
anh-about.bio:
I am currently a Computer Science senior student at San Francisco State University.
My plan is to graduate by Spring 2025.
I am the front-end lead of Team 4 for CSC 648.
I care a lot about appearance, and I want my project to look good the way I envision it.

geetarth-about.name: Venkata Geetarth Meduri
geetarth-about.bio:
I am a senior at San Francisco State University pursuing a Computer Science degree.
Currently, I am aiming to graduate in the Spring of 2025 and hopefully land a job in the AI field.
I am a part of Team 04, and I serve as the GitHub Master of the project.

nando-about.name: Fernando Malca
nando-about.bio:
• Senior at San Francisco State University.
• Pursuing a Bachelor's in Computer Science.
• Likes to relax and sleep in his free time.
